title: The true lovers admonition. Of all the colours in the world, the black hair is the best, though fair & brown may be well curl'd yet black exceeds the rest: that is the colour I do prize, and love beyond all measure, she that hath black hair and black eyes, esteem her as a treasure. The tune is, So sweet is the lass that loves me,.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for P. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in Pye-corner.,
